Module com.example.rupizzeria
Package client

Class PizzaStyleController

java.lang.Object
client.PizzaStyleController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChicagoStyleController, NYStyleController
public abstract class PizzaStyleController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is a more generic abstract controller class for different kinds of pizza style controllers. Reduces code duplication for the two other controllers, contains all fxml injection elements, and functionality ordering pizzas
Author:
Michael Liu, Genfu Liu
